This extension adds a browser button for easy access, allowing anyone to create discussion on about site on the internet at the click of a button.

Features of the Convo Space,

• Decentralized System: The Convo Space is intended to be fully decentralized, utilizing IDX for Authentication, Ceramic and IPFS for Storage ensuring that your data lives independent of the interface.

• Community Governed: Moderation powered by Conviction Voting is a crucial part of the system to ensure the dialogue between participants is effective and governed by the people and not the platform.

• Extensible Framework: Convo can be used as a singular layer to manage your conversations throughout the Internet and can be used to build upon and integrated into any application.
